description: A maid at the academy. Her hometown is Tarbes, Tristain and is the eldest of eight children. She loves Saito, and treats him very kindly, and is willing to do a lot of things to defeat her "rival" Louise for the love of Saito. She seems to know how Saito is treated, which could be what makes her so aggressive to take him away from Louise. She truthfully thinks to herself that she would make Saito much happier.
name: Siesta
